review: I didn't know what to expect from this device but it has proven to be a useful addition to our TV viewing. Our young son figured out all on his own how to synch our Kindle to broadcast to the TV set.I do wish it had more parental controls. TV shows just "autoplay" and start the next episode of whatever you're watching. If you're not careful Junior will get sucked into a TV marathon.I found the Music feature more useful than I expected. I can put on a playlist while working around the house without having to jump around to another device or a web browser to launch Pandora or Spotify.The Fire Stick was dead simple to set up and I had no WiFi issues or anything at all, it just worked. (It was much harder to get a game console to connect to my WiFi, for example.)
author: Wakka
